text: Ezɨ Devit deragha akar kam baraghizir puvatɨgha kamaghɨn an boroghɨn itir gumazibar azai, “Gumazir manatam Filistian gumazir kam mɨsueghtɨ, an aremeghtɨ, Israelian aghumsɨzir kam gɨvagham, eghtɨ atrivim manmaghɨn a damuam? Kɨ kamaghɨn gari, Filistian kam, a gumazir God gɨfozir puvatɨzim, egha uan mɨkarzir mogomemɨn inim atuzir puvatɨ. A uabɨ fava dɨbovir akabar Godɨn Zurara Itimɨn mɨdorozir gumazibav gei.”
